General.Name: Central Plaza Hotel Public Company Limited
General.Description: Central Plaza Hotel Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel business in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Hotel and Related Services Operation; and Food and Ice-Cream. It is also involved in the food and beverage, hotel management, and import and export businesses, as well as operates a spa and learning centre. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
